title: Kled Skin Fan Art By Alex Heath

embed.description: League of legends fan art of Kled. This is my skin variation for Kled. High seas Kled. enjoy!

body:
Hello.

My name is Alex, I am an Illustrator and Concept artist, but also a player of LoL. I have recently being playing some Kled and wanted to do a Pirate Skin for him and Skaarl. So here its is, High Seas Kled and Octo Skaarl. Enjoy

PS; I would love to  work at Riot and make these everyday!!

replies.body: It´s really good. But I don´t think that an octopus fits Skaarl´s personality well (it would also look strange when Kled rides Skaarl). Because an octopus is way braver than Skaarl is. I think a seahorse would fit better to Skaarl (and is better for the riding animations) but wouldn´t fit to the skin theme.
Parrot Skaarl?
Awwwwesome!
You know it! YOU WANNA HIRE HIM! THAT SPLASH ART OF HIGH SEAS KLED IS ON POINT.

> [{quoted}](name=AmazoX,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2017-03-01T06:35:41.573+0000)
>
> You know it! YOU WANNA HIRE HIM! THAT SPLASH ART OF HIGH SEAS KLED IS ON POINT.

too kind, I really wish to work on the illustration team at Riot

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-03-01T01:04:59.254+0000)
>
> Awwwwesome!

Ah Glad you like it, am I right in thinking you are the voice of Kled?
Skarls face is pure horror, that's some Orwellian shit right there.

> [{quoted}](name=Towboat421,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-28T15:48:46.757+0000)
>
> Skarls face is pure horror, that's some Orwellian shit right there.

hahahahahahaa thanks, did u mean Love Craftian? yeh his face was scaring me whilst drawing it

Its scary? huh.... 
.
. 
totally didn't think it made him look sexy.
Octoskaarl is something I will never stop needing

> [{quoted}](name=THE RlVER KlNG,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-02-28T21:08:26.740+0000)

hahahahaha you and me both
This needs more upvotes.

> [{quoted}](name=Korijenkins,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-28T13:24:00.285+0000)
>

Thanks :)

Just some ideas for maybe a lore backstory for this skin :D It could easily be made a 1350 or even 1800 skin.
We have the Flying Dutchman that haunts the seven seas in our lore, so why not have Skarl be the same thing in this skin line? Or working under the actual Captain of the Dutchman. His lore is the whole "NONE SHALL TRESPASS" theme also. So imagine turning this into a Half alive half dead sorta thing. Like Kled turns into a Skeletal version of himself if he loses Skarl, who could be some sort of Immortal Sea Lizard (Rito ples halp)

>
> Just some ideas for maybe a lore backstory for this skin :D It could easily be made a 1350 or even 1800 skin.
> We have the Flying Dutchman that haunts the seven seas in our lore, so why not have Skarl be the same thing in this skin line? Or working under the actual Captain of the Dutchman. His lore is the whole "NONE SHALL TRESPASS" theme also. So imagine turning this into a Half alive half dead sorta thing. Like Kled turns into a Skeletal version of himself if he loses Skarl, who could be some sort of Immortal Sea Lizard (Rito ples halp)

that is a sucha great idea!!
let's not fool ourselves, {{champion:240}} is the perfect pirate {{item:3903}} **ARRR!**
All water is his, to be on water is to be trespassing!

This is awesome, but Skaarl is Lollipoppy levels of terrifying lol.

>
> This is awesome, but Skaarl is Lollipoppy levels of terrifying lol.

hahahahahhaa "lollipoppy" great description

There was a guy on Reddit with this same idea but all he had was some sketches, but I liked his better.

(Not to say this art is bad, it's not, but I don't feel this is fufulling the fantisy  of High seas Keld very well.)

> [{quoted}](name=Knight of Bronze,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-02-28T16:44:43.590+0000)
>
> There was a guy on Reddit with this same idea but all he had was some sketches, but I liked his better.
> 
> (Not to say this art is bad, it's not, but I don't feel this is fufulling the fantisy  of High seas Keld very well.)

Would love to see those sketches if you had a link, would be cool to see

[Here is the Reddit Thread.](https://dd.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5vzvmt/skin_concept_high_seas_kled/) And here is the [Sketch](https://68.media.tumblr.com/2183f141480c16f7a2518c261d134262/tumblr_olsx43diQP1w6ymluo1_1280.png).

> [{quoted}](name=Knight of Bronze,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-03-01T17:09:57.709+0000)
>
> [Here is the Reddit Thread.](https://dd.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5vzvmt/skin_concept_high_seas_kled/) And here is the [Sketch](https://68.media.tumblr.com/2183f141480c16f7a2518c261d134262/tumblr_olsx43diQP1w6ymluo1_1280.png).

Awesome thanks for posting. Cool ideas in there.

Yep! 

You also mentioned you made a few sketches before settling on this composition, I would love to see them!

(Personal thoughts/criticisms on the piece follow)
The Octo Skaarl is the real problem wth your piece, the way he dominates the background and that... face, I would have rather seen a bit more the ship that is lurking in the top left, with more of the tentacles being shown wrapping around it/smashing it. 

Keld himself looks GREAT, really nice looking. The only issues I have with him is the belt I feel would have been better if it were on top of his shirt, that way you could show more pouches/mushroom juice hooked onto it.  It would sell it a bit better if his pants/boots looked wet he's riding a big slimy octo after all.
All your work is great. You definitely deserve a spot at Riot.
Hands down the best fanart I've seen to date. Looks shockingly like an official skin splash. Mind posting how many hours it took?

> [{quoted}](name=DUDE BRO,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=e5Ev8bzT,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-03-01T04:32:27.760+0000)
>
> Hands down the best fanart I've seen to date. Looks shockingly like an official skin splash. Mind posting how many hours it took?

Hello, hey thanks I am glad your a fan of it. it took about 20-25 hours altogether, including doing some sketches of different compositions before deciding on this one. I can post them if you would like to see them?
Yes please
Ideas: 1) Police/swat kled, add a siren on skarl head that lights up when ulting running ect 2) walking dead kled and skorol 3) vampire hunter kled and skaral
squidbillies: the skin
